{{Description|One day, you and Paimon pass through [[Wangshu Inn]], only for a notice to attract your attention...}}
'''Receiver of Friends From Afar''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.4]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2024/02/21 10:00:00 – 2024/03/04 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* Adventure Rank 28 or above 
* Complete Archon Quest Chapter I: Act III "[[A New Star Approaches]]"
** Complete Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act V "[[Masquerade of the Guilty]]" first for the best experience.

===Summary===
* After the event begins, new quests and challenges will unlock every 2 days. Newly unlocked content will require you to have finished the previous section of content to take it on.
* During the challenges, you must perform the prepping, mixing, and cooking processes in succession to create dishes that suit the customer's taste.
* After each challenge is completed, the player can view an example of each dish as they chose to plate it inside the inn's entrance, opposite of [[Verr Goldet]].

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Receiver of Friends From Afar 1.png
|text1  = In each challenge of "Receiver of Friends From Afar," you must continuously {{Color|help|prep, mix, and cook}} to make a dish that the guest wants.
|image2 = Tutorial Receiver of Friends From Afar 2.png
|text2  = After you begin prepping, the indicator on the slider will move back and forth between each end. When the indicator {{Color|help|points to the corresponding area, click on the button}} to mark one instance of {{Color|help|success}}.
|image3 = Tutorial Receiver of Friends From Afar 3.png
|text3  = After you begin mixing, hold the button to make the indicator bar move over the sliding ring. When the indicator bar {{Color|help|points to the prompted area, release the button}} to mark one instance of {{Color|help|success}}.
|image4 = Tutorial Receiver of Friends From Afar 4.png
|text4  = After you begin cooking, the indicator on the slider will move back and forth between each end. When the indicator {{Color|help|points to the corresponding area, click on the button}} to mark one instance of {{Color|help|success}}.
|image5 = Tutorial Receiver of Friends From Afar 5.png
|text5  = Once cooking is complete, you can plate and decorate the dish. Three elements of dishes can be decorated: the tableware, accessories, and add-ons. Each element has several decorations to choose from.
}}
